nodes.text: Pa Tho was an astronomical object located in the Inner Rim's Pa Tho system. It shared its name with the alien culture known as the Pa Tho, which had vanished at some point by 16 ABY. Pa Tho was also the homeworld of the Human Rebel pilot Nala Hetsime, who participated in the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.

Pa Tho was introduced in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Pa Tho system, and therefore the celestial body itself, in grid square K-14.
